snippet: After disbanding the band LCD Soundsystem, James Murphy has new music, new production projects and a new “personal store” on the horizon.
abstract: James Murphy is busy with new music, production projects and a personal store on the horizon after disbanding the band LCD Soundsystem; band's final concert is the subject of the documentary Shut Up and Play the Hits.
lead_paragraph: After disbanding the band LCD Soundsystem, James Murphy has new music, new production projects and a new “personal store” on the horizon.

headline.seo: James Murphy of LCD Soundsystem: ‘Shut Up and Play the Hits’
headline.main: Indie Club King Surveys Other Thrones
headline.print_headline: Indie Club King Surveys Other Thrones
